## GeoBox class

`GeoBox` is used to represent a bounding box in geo coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GeoBox implements GeoBoxExtentLike 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(southWest, northEast)](./harp-geoutils.geobox._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new <code>GeoBox</code> with the given geo coordinates. |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clone()](./harp-geoutils.geobox.clone.md) |  | Clones this <code>GeoBox</code> instance. |
|  [contains(point)](./harp-geoutils.geobox.contains.md) |  | Returns <code>true</code> if the given geo coordinates are contained in this <code>GeoBox</code>. |
|  [fromCenterAndExtents(center, extent)](./harp-geoutils.geobox.fromcenterandextents.md) | <code>static</code> | Returns a <code>GeoBox</code> with the given center and dimensions. |
